title: I only get to play early in the morning because of life, and now I can't play (only day off)
body:
Patcher is not updating. Stating error please check logs. I can't figure out how to submit logs. I ran the hextech repair kit....nada. Help please. Show me where to send you logs.
{{item:3187}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3751}}

replies.body: Is this an unspecified error, and if so at what percent is it happening?   That can help determine what's causing the issue.  Let me know!
